text: Carbonia (Carbònia, Crabònia) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 28,581 people lived there. Its area is 145.54 km². It is 111 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Carbonia, Sardinia
